nodes.text: Mephite crystals, simply known as mephite, were rare, lustrous kyber crystals found in a handful of pIaces in and around the Adega system and on Ilum.

One of five types of crystal known collectively as adegan crystals, mephite crystals were well suited for use in lightsabers due to their internal structure and light-modulating capabilities. Like all adegan crystals, mephite crystals were force-reactive and could be infused with a small amount of a Force-sensitive's power. When installed in a lightsaber and infused with the Force, mephite crystals gave off a small but steady Force signature that could be sensed by any nearby force user.
Mephite, along with pontite crystals, were discovered on Ilum by Jedi survey teams thousands of years before the Galactic Empire's formation.
